name: @justinmiehle/reporter-playwright
description: Panoptes reporter for Playwright test results

scripts.build: bunx esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --external:@justinmiehle/shared --external:@playwright/test --external:playwright && bunx tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --outDir dist --skipLibCheck src/index.ts
